user.title: PR Custom Component
user.description:
Please enter pending Pull Request link. After installation, you must restart Home Assistant to see the custom component.
>**Warning: This will overwrite the existing custom component in your `/config/custom_components` directory.**

data.pr_url: Link to Home Assistant Pull Request

error.bad_pr: Unable to process Pull Request Link.
error.rate_limited: Rate-limited by GitHub, please try again later.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
